LIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 491 AAO, Assistant Engineer and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 10:00 IST
 Life Insurance Corporation of India
 491 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 88,635 to 169,025




FOLLOW

Life Insurance Corporation of India has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the  81 vacancies for the Assistant Engineer and AAO Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Electrical Engineering or Civil Engineering, Any Degree, LLB can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the LIC Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Maharashtra

LIC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Posts	Qualification
Assistant Engineer	81	Any Degree, B.E/ B.Tech In Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, LLB
Assistant  Administrative Officer	410

Age Limit for the LIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 30 years.

Selection Process for the LIC Recruitment 2025

Preliminary Examination
Main Examination

Salary Structure for the LIC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 88,635 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 1,69,025 /- per month.

Application fee for the LIC Recruitment 2025

For SC/ST Candidates: Rs. 85 /-
For All Other Candidates: Rs. 700 /-
How to Apply Online for the LIC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the career page.
Check for the AAO, Assistant Engineer notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligbility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your email and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and take a printout of the application form for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Online Application	16-08-2025
Last Date of Online Application	08-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
